user.title: Connect to Amplifier
user.description: Configure connection to your Xantech, Dayton Audio, or Monoprice multi-zone amplifier.

data_description.port: Serial port path (e.g., /dev/ttyUSB0) or socket URL (socket://192.168.1.10:888/)
data_description.amp_type: Select the type of amplifier you have

zones.title: Name Your Zones
zones.description: Give each zone a friendly name. Zone IDs use standard addressing: first digit is the controller unit (1-3), second digit is the zone output (1-8). For example, 11-18 are zones on controller 1.

data_description.zones_config: One zone per line. Format: ID: Name (e.g., 11: Living Room)

sources.title: Name Your Audio Sources
sources.description: Name the audio inputs. Source IDs (1-8) correspond to input channels.

data_description.sources_config: One source per line. Format: ID: Name

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect. Verify the serial port path and cable connection.
error.invalid_zones: Could not parse zones. Use format: 11: Living Room
error.invalid_sources: Could not parse sources. Use format: 1: TV

abort.already_configured: This amplifier is already set up.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the amplifier for status updates (in seconds)

snapshot.name: Snapshot
snapshot.description: Save the current state of a zone for later restoration.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Media player zone entities to snapshot.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: Restore a zone to a previously saved snapshot state.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Media player zone entities to restore.
